title: new client login bug

replies.body: For some reason, your network may be blocking the test client from reaching the authentication servers.  I suggest grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure your firewall is configured to allow it just in case.  Should that not work, go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Hope that helps!
